page.title: 15Kinver Sports Facilities
page.content: The Edgecliff School Sports Centre is open to the public at evenings and weekends. There is provision for tennis, badminton, basketball, five-a- side football, gymnastics and weight- training. Outside there is a floodlit area for tennis and netball. There are football, cricket, hockey and rounders pitches, a 400 metre running track and facilities for long, high and triple jumps and for shot-putting. There is a skittle-alley owned by the Kinfare Restaurant. The boxing club have their own building. There is a football pitch at the Marsh Lane Playing Field. The Stewpony Public House at Stourton used to have an open-air swimming pool but it fell into disrepair and was closed. Many people in Kinver would like a new pool.
